page.title: 05HOUSING - COUNCIL HOUSES
page.content: {Grove Park Estate,}just off the A465 road, is actually in the parish of Kenderchurch, although the postal address is Wormbridge. There are 18 houses and 4 bungalows. The first ten houses were built in 1953/4 and the remainder added in 1970. Together with three other dwellings on the opposite side of the road this development increased the population approximately threefold. The{present population}is 68. {Mains electricity and water}were connected to the site in the late 1950's. Before this water was pumped from a 90 foot{bore hole}on the site to a tank in the roof of houses 9 and 10, thence fed by gravity to all the houses. Initially all the houses were {Council property}but now four are privately owned.
